MemoryInfobox.description: 'Though the Ardos|young boy's claim of a living Minotaur seemed improbable to her, Kassandra decided to help him search for his Nikios|father.'

General_Description: '''Myths and Minotaurs''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met a [[Ardos|young boy]] at the [[Knossos Palace]] who claimed to have seen a living [[Minotaur]].
Section_Dialogue:
Exploring the Knossos Palace, Kassandra came upon a camp someone had put together. Intrigued, she inspected it. As she knelt before the chest in the camp, a voice rang behind her. *'''Ardos:''' ''Don't touch that chest! It's mine!'' Kassandra stood up and turned to face the boy. |-|I'm not a thief.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm no thief, but if I was—
I'd want something more valuable.'' *'''Ardos:''' ''Take that'' back. |-|Try and stop me.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Feeling brave, are you?'' *'''Ardos:''' ''Me? No. Brave people are just looking for trouble.
But if ''you'' wanna be brave? ''Open it. *'''Kassandra:''' ''This is junk.'' *'''Ardos:''' ''Maybe to you—
—but it's all I have.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''These ruins are an... interesting place to set up camp. What brings you here?'' Ardos walked past her, and then sighed. *'''Ardos:''' ''A long time ago, below this very spot, my ''pater''—the great adventurer, [[Nikios]]—entered the [[Labyrinth of Lost Souls|labyrinth]] to steal the [[Minotaur]]'s treasure.
As I waited outside, I heard shouts and roars, then his men came pouring out—
His men, but not ''pater''. I need to save him.'' |-|Leiandros' questline not started= {{#tag:tabber| The Minotaur is no match for me.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your monster is no match for my or my [[Spear of Leonidas|spear]].'' *'''Ardos:''' ''Suuure.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''If he's real, killing a creature of legend would be worth my time.'' *'''Ardos:''' ''Of course he's real!'' {{!}}-{{!}} The Minotaur is a mighty beast.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''The Minotaur would be a match for any mortal... but wasn't it slain by [[Theseus]]?'' *'''Ardos:''' ''No, ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''. It's very much alive and well.'' }} |-|Leiandros' questline incomplete= *'''Kassandra:''' ''A tragic tale... But last I heard, the Minotaur was living in Pephka. He's quite famous.'' *'''Ardos:''' ''They don't know what they're talking about! The real Minotaur is in [[Messara]]!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''That's what they said in Pephka.'' *'''Ardos:''' ''It's a scam.
Trust me, I know scams.'' |-|Leiandros' questline complete= {{#tag:tabber| The Minotaur was just a man.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''The Minotaur was just a [[Leiandros|man in a mask]].
And not much a man at that.'' {{!}}-{{!}} You shouldn't believe the myths.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I've met the Minotaur... He's not what you think.'' }} *'''Ardos:''' ''Those idiots in [[Pephka]]—they wouldn't know a ''real'' Minotaur if it ran them through with its horns!
It's not like that here, ''misthios. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Where is he then? You said the labyrinth was beneath us—'' *'''Ardos:''' ''Yeah! There's a ''creepy'' looking trapdoor beneath the temple!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Take me there, and I will slay the Minotaur and find your ''pater's— Ardos looked at her hopefully. She stammered. *'''Kassandra:''' ''...Find your ''pater. *'''Ardos:''' ''You-you'll do that?'' (Accepting the quest segues into [[Of Minotaurs and Men]])
Section_Outcome: Kassandra set about finding a way inside, by investigating the men who accompanied Ardos' father Nikios inside several years prior.
